version_description:
- Check out the new tutorial with the clearest instructions, we hope it will make the game process even more enjoyable!
- Performance and stability improvements;

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at: support@appcraft.by

- Check out our new cool ‘dangerrrous’ design with spikes in the Challenge mode!
- New magical animation when the numbers match
- A little bit of Christmas mood in the app
- We continue to work on improving the tutorial as well
- Performance and stability improvements
Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at: support@appcraft.by

- Performance and stability improvements


Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at: support@appcraft.by

- Some tweaks in game modes: Random Mode is now called Dynamic, and Challenge Mode is now Survival
- Now you have several lives in the Survival mode! It means more chances to win! When the board is filled with numbers, you can continue the game and the app will wipe out the extra numbers from the board
- New bright color zones in the Dynamic and Classic modes
- A new mechanics of achievements
- Performance and stability improvements
Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at: support@appcraft.by

- Amazing news! The leaderboard is here! Now you can compete with friends in Numberzilla. Just log into Facebook in the app and see who will make it to the top.
- Great changes in the Dynamic mode: we are introducing Shuffle button and Levels!
Once you reach the maximum amount of numbers - you will be able to shuffle them. Go for it and you will make it to the next level!
- Finally, the Classic mode is no longer limited to the basic set of numbers - you will have random numbers here now. We hope it will make the game more exciting for you;
- Performance and stability improvements and regular bug fixes
Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at: support@appcraft.by

- Amazing news! The leaderboard is here! Now you can compete with friends in Numberzilla. Just log into Facebook in the app and see who will make it to the top.
- Great changes in the Dynamic mode: we are introducing Shuffle button and Levels!
Once you reach the maximum amount of numbers - you will be able to shuffle them. Go for it and you will make it to the next level!
- Finally, the Classic mode is no longer limited to the basic set of numbers - you will have random numbers here now. We hope it will make the game more exciting for you;
- Performance and stability improvements and regular bug fixes
Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at: support@appcraft.by

- Tired of playing alone? Invite your friends to join the leaderboard and play together!
- To make all the rules crystal clear, we have added short descriptions of the modes when you first open each of them.
- In Classic mode, you are free to choose if you would like to play with the set of numbers from 1 to 19 or a random set!
- Performance and stability improvements and regular bug fixes.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at support@appcraft.by

- If you leaderboard was empty before, we have some great news: the global rating is now available. Compare your high scores with the top players worldwide.
- Performance and stability improvements and regular bug fixes.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at support@appcraft.by

- Save your time, no need to watch ads! We have added the opportunity to purchase hints and undos when you need them. If you don't feel like purchasing the boosters, you can always continue playing with watching videos for rewards.
- Turn on push notifications to receive your weekly position in the Leaderboard, and be the first to find out about promotions and gifts.
- Performance improvements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at support@appcraft.by

- It's a blast! Meet a completely new booster in the game which will turn all the process upside down - the BOMB! Move the target area to explode the square of 9 numbers and get more chances to win the game;
- Performance and stability improvements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at info@liftapp.by.

- Now you can completely remove all banners and the video ads appearing between the game sessions by purchasing a special No Ads Offer.
- Performance and stability improvements
